text: "Get Used to It" is a song written by Michael Omartian and Roger Voudouris and performed by Voudouris. It reached #4 in Australia, NOTE: Used for Australian singles and albums charting from 1970 until ARIA created their own charts in mid-1988. #18 on the U.S. adult contemporary chart, and #21 on the Billboard Hot 100 in 1979.Roger Voudouris, "Get Used to It" US chart positions Retrieved August 25, 2016. The song was featured on his 1979 album, Radio Dream.Roger Voudouris, Radio Dream Retrieved August 25, 2016. The song was produced by Michael Omartian.Roger Voudouris, "Get Used to It" single release Retrieved August 25, 2016. The single spent 19 weeks on the American charts, ranking 83rd on the Billboard Year-End Hot 100 singles of 1979. ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1979) !align="left"|Peak position |- |Australia (Kent Music Report) NOTE: Used for Australian singles and albums charting from 1970 until ARIA created their own charts in mid-1988. | style="text-align:center;"|4 |- |Canada RPM Top Singles | style="text- align:center;"|45 |- |New Zealand (RIANZ)2 September 1979 | style="text- align:center;"|20 |- |US Billboard Hot 100Joel Whitburn's Top Pop Singles 1955–1990 - | style="text-align:center;"|21 |- |US Billboard Adult Contemporary | style="text-align:center;"|18 |- |US Cash Box Top 100 |align="center"|22 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1979) ! style="text-align:center;"|Rank |- |Australia | style="text-align:center;"|36 |- |US Billboard Hot 100Musicoutfitters.com | style="text-align:center;"|83 |- |} ==See also== *List of 1970s one-hit wonders in the United States ==References== ==External links== *Lyrics of this song * Category:1979 songs Category:1979 singles Category:Songs written by Michael Omartian Category:Song recordings produced by Michael Omartian Category:Warner Records singles
